addr: 212 East 52nd St. 3rd Floor. New York, NY 10022
title: Lisa Kalil at Club Bonafide
desc: Doors at 6:00pm | 21+ admitted | Set at 10pm 2 drink minimum for table service |? Happy Hour 6pm-7pm ? Lisa Kalil is a singer and songwriter born in Sao Paulo, Brazil. She moved to New York at age 18 in search of her own sound. In 2012 Lisa was accepted to The New School where she pursued her BFA in Vocal Performance and her BA in Culture and Media which she will be graduating this Fall from. Traveling back and forth between Sao Paulo and New York, Lisa has cumulated experience as a singer participating of projects with renowned Brazilian and American artists such as Rubens Salles, Toquinho, Loop B and having the honor to perform along with pianist Danny Mixon, her professor at The New School.? Lisa also has performed on TV in Brazil and is now working on her own project, to be recorded this spring. https://www.facebook.com/lisakalil1
